description: Schema for a transaction object, including details about the transaction, seller, metadata, amount, currency, and timestamp.

transaction.description: Contains information about the transaction, including a unique identifier.

seller.description: Information about the seller involved in the transaction.

metadata.description: Additional metadata about the transaction, including payment and payout details.

payment.description: Reference to the payment definition, detailing the payment aspect of the transaction.

payout.description: Reference to the payout definition, detailing the payout aspect of the transaction.

amount.description: The monetary amount involved in the transaction.

currency.description: The type of currency used in the transaction.

at.description: The timestamp of when the transaction took place.

buyer.description: Information about the buyer involved in the transaction.

checkout.description: Details about the checkout process in the transaction.

id.description: Unique identifier for the checkout process.

payment.description: Information about the payment part of the transaction.

checkout.description: Reference to the checkout details associated with the payment.

buyer.description: Reference to the buyer details associated with the payment.

payout.description: Details about the payout aspect of the transaction.
